mapper.select: SELECT * , USER_ID as userId , IMAGE_PATH as imagePath , REG_DT as regDt , UDT_DT as udtDt FROM USER WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER(user_id, address, nickname, grade, image_path, reg_dt, udt_dt) VALUES(#{userId}, #{address}, #{nickname}, #{grade}, #{imagePath}, #{regDt}, #{udtDt})
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET address = #{address}, nickname = #{nickname}, image_path = #{imagePath}, udt_dt = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
